short_description: This function evaluate and emits various metrics of classification model based on it's predictions on the data
long_description: This function evaluate and emits various metrics of classification model based on it's predictions on the data

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing expected and predicted labels.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing expected and predicted labels.

output_tables.name: OutputTable
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name for the output table that the function creates. The outputtable must not already exist.
output_tables.description: [Specify to emit various metrics.] Specify the name for the output table that the function creates. The outputtable must not already exist.

argument_clauses.name: ObservationColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the ObservationColumn in InputTable which contains expected labels.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the ObservationColumn in InputTable which contains expected labels.

argument_clauses.name: PredictionColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the PredictionColumn in InputTable which contains predicted labels.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the PredictionColumn in InputTable which contains predicted labels.

argument_clauses.name: NumLabels
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of labels in the dataset. Valid value is in between 1 and 512. Applicable only when user does not provide Labels argument.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of labels in the dataset. Valid value is in between 1 and 512. Applicable only when user does not provide Labels argument.

argument_clauses.name: Labels
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the list of all labels present in the data
argument_clauses.description: Specify the list of all labels present in the data
